Description of incident: Credit card data was stolen. Individuals holding the HSBC-issued General Motors Mastercard were told their cards should be replaced.              UPDATE(07/10/07): U.S. Secret Service                agents found Ralph Polo Lauren customers' credit card numbers in                the hands of Eastern European cyber thieves who created high-quality                counterfeit credit cards. Victims are from the U.S., Europe, Asia                and Canada, among other places, Several Cuban nationals in Florida                were arrested with more than 200,000 credit card account numbers.
